extendedInfo.description: LOLCam - Add beautiful text and filters to your photos and share them on Facebook, Twitter, E-mail, SMS, and Instagram. In a few seconds you can add captions, quotes, jokes, memes, poems, or anything else you can think of to your photos!Create funny, inspirational, or informative images to share quickly and easily -- and follow your friends' photos with a click of a single button. Every day, open LOLCam, to see amazing photos shared by your friends as well as creative people from around the world that you can re-share: birthday cards, hilarious memes, postcards, infographics, uplifting quotes, adorable pets, provocative poems, and more.Features:â Add beautiful text over your photos with tons of gorgeous fonts, with more added all the time!â Resize, align, and position your text.â Add filters to make your every day photos into works of art!â Easily share your creations via Facebook, Twitter, E-mail, SMS, Instagram and more.â Discover other awesome photos and memes shared by other users.â Import and get alerts on your friend's birthdays, parties, and other events. LOLCam will make sure you always send them the most unique birthday or greeting cards!â Interact with friends through giving & receiving likes and commentsâ NO ADS!â And much much more...

reviews.title: A little annoying
